Boomerang Weapon.description:
Fires projectile that upon 
reaching max range, returns 
towards the player.

Orbit Weapon.description:
Fires projectiles that 
orbit the player.

Papyrmancer Sow.description:
Create a projectile that
follows the cursor, dealing
damage and marking any
enemy hit with Sow

Papyrmancer Reap.description:
Creates a projectile at all
enemies marked with Sow,
recalling them towards the
player dealing damage to all
enemies along the path.
